::Autofire::

Autofire lands in front of Megatron, noting that his employer was
pretty pissed off.

"We attacked, and the Alliance attacked our backs," he knew the
Alliance from having been allied with them when he first got to the
planet, "Then another faction attacked the Maximals, and another
faction attacked that faction. You told me to attack, not conquer, so
I had the troops pull back before a few of them died."

He wasn't afraid of Megatron, since the Decepticon commander would
have to reach up pretty far to hit him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> OOC: Im not to sure what you meant about this, is it an attack towards 
> me?
> 
> > Hot Spot yelled out as a sword dug into his side, and collapsed,
cursing 
> > Headstrong before he slammed to his chest.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Megatron listened to Astroblast complain.  "Fine, replace your parts, 
> and be quick about it, take the new recruit" he started, looking 
> towards Cepta, "with you". He stepped out of his soldier, and walked 
> towards the Stunticons. Beastbox roared from inside Drag Strip, "What 
> we do now boss". "Simple my dear beserker" Megatron replied. "We will 
> regroup..." he trailed off when he noticed Razorclaw and Autofire 
> coming in. "What happened" he asked, his voice showing his fury.
